channel.title: life on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in life on Barefoot Rob

item.title: babaji
item.description: 15:27 Wednesday 05 October 2016 JST Lin and I went to see Babaji this morning at Paola’s house. I asked him what to do when I get pissed off at Lin and want to yell at her or break up with her. He said when I feel the anger, instead of quarreling with her, I should walk away until the feeling leaves on its own. I asked what to do with the feeling that I’ve married the wrong person.

item.title: life
item.description: 12:08pm Monday 24 April 2000 Several journal entries are on my computer at my house. They’ll flood my website as soon as we get a dial tone! Life without email seems just as hectic as life with the extra requirement to dig through all the spam, all the >> > > > > forwards, all the email crap I get. Don’t get me wrong, I want the stuff that is funny.
